feed.title: Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 12:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: E 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
